tool_description: Download QR Code with any custom text
name: QR Code
title: QR Code

api_list.name: Download QR Code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code67.p.rapidapi.com/qrcode/download/google.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code67.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code67.p.rapidapi.com/qrcode/download/{any_text}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code67.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
